description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension); single storey front porch extension; replacement of UPVC windows throughout property with timber framed windows to front and side elevations (South, East and West), and slim metal framed windows to the rear elevation (North); and single storey detached rear outbuilding for use as garden room
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

Drawing number A001 Rev P01 - Block and location plan, Drawing number A100 Rev P01 - Existing ground floor plan, Drawing number A101 Rev P01 - Existing first floor plan, Drawing number A101 Rev P01 - Existing roof plan, Drawing number A200 Rev P01 - Existing south elevation, Drawing number A201 Rev P01 - Existing north elevation, Drawing number A202 Rev P01 - Existing side elevations, Drawing number A203 Rev P01 - Existing sectional plan, Drawing number A300 Rev P02 - Proposed ground floor plan, Drawing number A300 Rev P01 - Proposed first floor plan, Drawing number A302 Rev P01 - Proposed roof plan, Drawing number A400 Rev P01 - Proposed south elevation, Drawing number A401 Rev P02 - Proposed north elevation, Drawing number A402 Rev P01 - Proposed side elevations, Drawing number A403 Rev P02 - Proposed section, Drawing number A501 Rev P03 - Proposed outbuilding floor plan, Drawing number A502 Rev P03 - Proposed outbuilding elevations, Drawing number A600 Rev P02 - Proposed windows,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Prior to commencement of the development, details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Development shall be carried out only in accordance with the approved details and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure that the materials are of an appropriate quality and standard as to preserve the character and appearance of the site and conservation area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The hereby approved replacement windows to the front elevation shall be white in colour.

Reason: To ensure that the materials are of an appropriate quality/ standard as to preserve the character and appearance of the site and conservation area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The permitted rooflight on the rear elevation shall at all times be of a 'conservation style' and be flush with the roofslope.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the single storey projection to the side and rear shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| Prior to first use, the green roof on the single storey rear extension, as shown on the approved plans listed in Condition 2, shall be in place. This shall then be maintained in perpetuity.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 186 Pitshanger Lane Ealing W5 1QG0NS only and not for any other use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the  site and to ensure that the  use of the building does not, by reason  of  any  other  activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document  (2013), policy D6 of  the  London  Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
